phrases: living your life do not give up now keep moving on
kimi wo dakishimeru nandomo nandomo nandomo
ashita boku wa kimi ni deau darou
boku ni wa kimi ga wakaru yo wakaru yo
sen'oku no toki wo koe futari hiraku densetsu no tobira
kimi to hai ni naru tame
nagaki rinne wo kanashimi tsurete tabi shitekitanda
zenryoku de mikansei kimi no tonari de
kawaita kokoro hodoke chi wo nagasu kedo
soba ni iru yo zutto yorisotte zutto
futari hikari no fune ni noru
kaze no hajimari no oto kanadeyou
Just live your life, do not give up now, keep moving on
And I will come for you over and over and over again
We will find each other soon enough
By the faintest glimmer of starlight
I know you, I know you
It is been billions of years, but now we can open the door to our legend
I crossed over the deep blue void
so I could burn to ash along with you
I have had a long journey on the vast wheel of fate, gathering sorrows along the way
I am not perfect, but I am giving all I have
If I open my fragile heart to you, I know I will bleed...
But I will always be with you, always be in your arms
We will get on a shining ship of light
And call forth the wind with our voices
We were not spirited away on the wind
katamichi bun no yuuki de bokura
We knew we could never return, and found the courage
kokoro ga koko ni atta hazu no kuudou
There is an emptiness where my heart used to be
kimi wo mirai wo sukueta darou ka
I could have saved you, and our future...
taisetsu na hito wo mamoru sube ga tatta hitotsu shika motanai
I only know of one way to keep the people I love
And you left me and disappeared into the sky
anata ijou no hito ni deaenai
I will never find anyone like you again
A long flare reaches out against the moon
The story ends before it could even begin
I will call up the melody locked away
And sing it until I destroy myself
That is how much I love you
I am sure I know who he is.
Do not change the subject, Izumo.
Fine, I will say it for you.
He is the pilot of the Machine Angel who unsealed the forbidden Union.
With golden eyes and amber hair that flutters in the breeze.
A young boy who resembles our sleeping Eve.
Altair has lost all its women.
We, its denizens, are on our way to extinction.
We began investigating Vega, hoping to find the solution.
we formed a plan to capture Rare Iguras, women who could withstand Altair's environment,
and use them as Eves to bear the future of our world.
One of the candidates was that same sleeping Eve: Alisia.
But when subjected to dimensional travel, she fell into a deathlike sleep,
Now she is just used trash.
While we returned to Altair, she bore a child,
and left it on Vega when we came back for her.
She could not be our True Eve.
She will just sleep in there forever.
Nothing but a doll for you to gaze at for comfort.
The scales of a wingless butterfly
put an end to this long dream.
You will not lay a hand on Alisia!
How would you make this dream end?
Jin has infiltrated the Machine Angel's nest!
We can choose from the Rare Iguras who pilot it!
On Vega, butterflies are a symbol of rebirth.
Thus, forbidden love shall be reborn.
I can feel it roaring within you.
Soon your past will be unleashed.
Every bit of it, not a drop left behind.
Yes, those memories of Apollon and Silvie sleeping inside you.
Silvie is so close to your heart.
She sighs delicately, and her voice is so sweet...
She could bring bliss to the heavens themselves.
Following her warmth, a love has been reborn countless times.
You want that love, do not you?
You want to have the forbidden Union, do not you?
You are a hungry beast, howling for love.
Go out and find your love, and sate your hunger.
I do not care about the revival of the Rare Igura that will bear Altair's future.
I want the rebirth of the Machine Angel of Genesis slumbering in Vega.
And if you ever try anything again,
Will Akbarjin Batbayar please come out?
Now, no more trying to sneak into the girls' dorms.
Cayenne, you pointed a gun at your classmates.
Stay in there a bit longer and think about what you have done.
That is supposed to be Alisia?
He did pass Neo-Deava's final tests.
Did not Yunoha say she understands how Jin feels?
There is a lot we do not know about him,
but at least he does not seem like a bad guy.
If we got to know him better, we could ask him,
and get to understand him better.
You would not believe the lines!
Hey, what is with you two sitting together and moping?
Hey, that is an indirect kiss!
Can I try some of yours too?
Man, Zessica, you are really thirsty, huh?
Do not let Kagura get to Vega!
Let me give you a flower for your journey.
I pray that the fire of love in your eyes
sheds light on the Machine Angel of Genesis.
I do not care how thirsty you are!
Do not do things like that when people can see!
Why do not you leave a pot of barley tea brewed?
I do not like barley tea.
It does not matter, just do not do that again.
Do not you have afternoon classes?
I tried to stitch the inside of the hem evenly,
but it did not work very well...
I hope Jin opens up to her.
You think this is not going to affect you?
Listen, the ladies are always thirsty for love.
If you want it, you got to dig.
Dig to the well down in Mikono's heart.
It should not be an issue when this war with the Abductors is over.
But you would better reserve her for then.
If you stall, someone else is going to take her from you.
Mikono, can I talk to you?
You are going to do it right now?
Well, he is the second hole digging bro.
He is standing up for himself.
I cannot let you go to Vega.
Get out of the Mithra and go back to Izumo!
You want Ianthe to get smashed, or you want to open the gate for me?
Kagura's combat abilities have increased by an order of magnitude!
Blooms out of season, but falls in a blink.
Such a flower is the Kagura camellia.
All I do, I do for love!
All units are out of the line of fire!
What is she have that I do not?
So what did you want to talk about?
Um... it is about that guy...
Someone else is going to take her from you.
Wait, that is not what I meant!
C-Can you look that way for a second?
Um... I... not right now, but...
After the war with the Abductors is over,
Your love may not be with you now,
but you can change everything with a mere scream.
I want to kill that wench.
then take her in my arms...
Kagura is merely answering the call of the wild.
To the holy land of love!
That day at the movies was when we first met.
I have constantly been in flight ever since then.
Next time on Aquarion Evol: Skies of Aquaria.
